title: SF-12
author: Laurel Dernbach
description: short-form questionnaire to measure quality of life

1.instructions: This survey asks for your views about your health. This information will help keep track of how you feel and how well you are able to do your usual activities. Please answer every question by marking one box. If you are unsure about how to answer, please give the best answer you can.
1.question: In general would you say your health is:

2.instructions: The following questions are about activities you might do during a typical day. Does your health now limit you in these activities? If so, how much?
2.question: Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf

3.instructions: The following questions are about activities you might do during a typical day. Does your health now limit you in these activities? If so, how much?
3.question: Climbing several flights of stairs

4.instructions: During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health?
4.question: Accomplished less than you would like

5.instructions: During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health?
5.question: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities

6.instructions: During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious)?
6.question: Accomplished less than you would like

7.instructions: During the past week, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious)?
7.question: Didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual

8.question: During the past week, how much did pain interfere with your normal work (including both work outside the home and housework)?

9.instructions: These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past week. For each question, please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.
9.question: How much of the time during the past week have you felt calm and peaceful?

responses.4: A good bit of the time

10.instructions: These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past week. For each question, please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.
10.question: How much of the time during the past week did you have a lot of energy?

responses.4: A good bit of the time

11.instructions: These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past week. For each question, please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.
11.question: How much of the time during the past week have you felt downhearted and blue?

responses.3: A good bit of the time

12.instructions: These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past week. For each question, please give the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.
12.question: How much of the time during the past week has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting with friends, relatives, etc.)?
